body:
Captain Jack's favorite! Enjoy a beautiful sunset cruise on a private chartered yacht. Find out why Santa Barbara is known as the "American Riviera" as you enjoy the sunset and the sparkling lights of the city. The price includes two hours on a private yacht. Cruise duration can be extended and does not necessarily need to go out at sunset.

We also offer many other styles of boats and yachts, view our [private chartered boats](/boat-charters) for more information.
priceLong:
**$475 for 2 hour cruise**

plus 12% port fee and 18% gratuity

6 passenger maximum
title: Private Sailing Cruise
